charite 0.4.0

Package index

Main Functions

theme_charite()
A custom ggplot2 theme for Charite – Universitaetsmedizin Berlin by Johannes Julius Mohn
theme_sci()
A custom ggplot2 theme for scientific publications by Johannes Julius Mohn
nice_save()
High-resolution (300dpi) figure export for publications and slides

Utilities

charite_colors
Hex code color definitions of the official Charite visual identity color scheme
charite_palettes
Charite color palettes
preview_charite_palettes()
Preview available color palettes
scale_color_charite()
Charite color scale for ggplot2
scale_fill_charite()
Charite fill scale for ggplot2
make_charite_palette()
Interpolation or reversion of a Charite color palette
example_plot()
Generate an example plot with theme_charite().

Data

curves
Simulated example time series data

Misc

virchow()
ASCII art of Rudolf Virchow
